name: fractional-indexing-jittered
description: Fractional index library with jittering and generator

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p ./tsconfig.esm.json && mv lib/esm/index.js lib/esm/index.mjs && mv lib/esm/index.d.ts lib/esm/index.d.mts
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p ./tsconfig.cjs.json && mv lib/cjs/index.js lib/cjs/index.cjs && mv lib/cjs/index.d.ts lib/cjs/index.d.cts

author: https://github.com/TMeerhof
